resources.string: understand me. help me. teach me.

"Dyslexia is NOT a disease and is NOT a disability. People with dyslexia have different perceptions, they get to know the world around them differently. Children with dyslexia learn to write, read or think like any other child - through exercise, the process is specific to their needs. "
A list of all registered specialists listed in alphabetical order according to the city where they are practiced can be found here:
ou can filter by city by typing the city name in the search engine found here:

The underlying sign is a specific and significant impairment in the development of reading skills that can not be explained by the mental age of the child with visual acuity problems or inadequate schooling.
Understanding reading skills, reading skills, reading skills, and tasks requiring reading can be affected. It is often accompanied by spelling difficulties.
Children with specific reading disorders have a history of specific speech and language development disorders. Often, emotional and behavioral disorders are observed.
Discocclusion encompasses a specific violation of arithmetic skills that can not be explained by mental retardation or inadequate schooling.
The violation primarily affects the ability to perform the basic arithmetic, as well as more abstracts, including:

The main symptom of this disorder is a specific and significant disruption in the development of spelling skills in the absence of a specific reading disorder that can not be explained by the child\'s low mental age with problems in the severity of vision or inadequate schooling.
Discription affects both the ability to pronounce the letters in the word and the proper spelling of words.

"The questionnaire below refers to the way the child learns and processes information and is created to help undetect the potential problem.
This is not a diagnosis
In case of learning difficulties always consult the teacher and the child's pediatrician to make sure that the problem is not in the teaching method or because of health problems such as hearing or vision impairment.
Always consult a specialist to make a deeper analysis instead of diagnosing yourself! "
Note: The child\'s name is used only for convenience when completing the test. We do not save or use the names in any way. If you do not want to use real names, it will not affect the test.
Everyday ___ is interested and clear minded:
___ has a particular or unnatural body value:
I want to send the result as an email
I want to add a resource list to the text of the email
has a particular or unnatural body value:
. If the score is higher than 5 we advise you to consult with a specialist, but don\'t forget to contact the teacher of the child first

What is dyslexia and how to know it\nStudy strategies for children with dyslexia\nDo not forget, that this test is not a diagnosis. Always contact the child\'s teacher, doctor and a specialist before you've accepted, that your child has dyslexia.
